9 May 2020
Madrid

Because of the prevention measures and recommendations decreed by our national and autonomic authorities, We have decided to postpone our scheduled event of May.

Every member of JSDay's Team is working on being able to announce a date for the event as soon as possible, but it will be in May 2021.

Thanks for the interest!

Stay up to date by subscribing to the JSDayES newsletter.
No spam, just important stuff about the event.
